author: aconway
msg: QPID-3202: Clustered brokers shut down with "unknown connection" error.
This error is an assertion recently introduced in r1091097, the bug
has probably been there for a while.
- Connections that close before they are announced no longer send a deliver-close.
- Fixed race in OutputInterceptor that sent a deliver-do-output after deliver-close.

author: jbellis
msg: update python driver to conform to PEP-249
patch by jhermes and thobbs; reviewed by jbellis for CASSANDRA-2402

author: maxcom
msg: OOXMLParserTest: enable testWordPicturesInHeader that was disabled due to bug in POI 3.8beta1

author: sebb
msg: Allow selection of JVM trust manager
